quote_last: , accompanied by two small dogs and wearing an outrageously large hat.
title: Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: When Odell arrived back at the hotel
quote_last: , the first thing he did was order a large flask of hot fruit punch before walking out onto the veranda to take up his post.
title: Paths of Glory
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: She read the page carefully and then said, “
quote_last: - cat goes to the toilet in front garden.”
title: What Was Lost
author: Catherine O'Flynn
